nodes.bodyText:
Wait what?
Does any map even use this?

I've all maps cloned to "work/maps"
dan@dan-xps:~$ cd work/maps/
dan@dan-xps:~/work/maps$ find . -name "dependencies.txt"
dan@dan-xps:~/work/maps$ 

I was a bit surprised. I wonder if maybe back when we had 'variants', if it was used then. We've since merged all of the core map data into each variant to remove the variant maps and have them as stand-alone. If that is the case, it explains this could having been used but no longer.
